p: A yeast cell-based method was established based on the finding that coronavirus methyltransferase can functionally replace a methyltransferase essential for yeast viability ( Chen et al., 2009, Sun et al., 2014). In this method, Sun et al. constructed recombinant yeasts producing the viral methyltransferase instead of the yeast one ( Sun et al., 2014). This strain was used for a HTS of methyltransferase inhibitor activity that negatively correlated with the cell density after 20Â h incubation.
